title: E-sports $600M global opportunity: MKM
text:
E-sports $600M global opportunity: MKM 9 Hours Ago MKM Partners' Eric Handler thinks e-sports is a $600 million opportunity. CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports Activision Blizzard announced a division devoted to e-sports.
